authors.headline: Subject Matter Expert Security & Defence, International Relations,  Civil Military Interaction

profile_positions.description: Honoured to have been made available by the Armed Forces in order to strengthen the NATO branch of the sub-Directorate of International Affairs in the Policy Directorate of the Ministry of Defence. Putting my acquired NATO and International affairs expertise (knowledge * experience) to good use... NATO strong!
profile_positions.title: Sr. Policy Advisor NATO & International Affairs

profile_positions.description:
Education Permanente is a great aim, and I could contribute. Looking for an interactive couple of hours for small groups up to larger audiences: consider International Security Relations a/o contemporary conflict as the topic of elaboration! 
I have performed such sessions for the Staffs of 13th Infantery Battalion of the 11th AASLT Brigade, and of the the Engineer Battalion of the Operational Support Command of the Army, for the NCO's of the Supply & Transport Command of the Army, for the junior Officers of the Supply and Transport Command of the Army, for the International Relations students of the University of Leiden, for International Relations students & Alumni of the University of Groningen, for the National Operations  officers of the 11th Air Assault Brigade, for the National Operations Community of the Army, and for numerous course audiences [both foreign as national civil servants and policy makers] at the Clingendael Institute.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer on Contemporary Conflict & International Relations
Officer in the Army & the Joint Services environment

company.name: International Military Cooperation resort of the Netherlands' Defence Staff

profile_positions.company: International Military Cooperation resort of the Netherlands' Defence Staff
profile_positions.description:
The International Military Cooperation [IMC] resort is the expertise authority within the Defence Staff with regard to the international military environment and the multinational organisations and  multilateral & bilateral relations within that environment. 

IMC develops and sustains an international network and expertise on political-military developments in the International Organisations ans [potential] partner countries. 

IMC is embedded directly under the Commander of the Armed Forces, and supports the directorates of the Defence Staff in international military cooperation and in policy development.
profile_positions.title: Sr. Staff Officer NATO

profile_positions.description:
As a Lieutenant-Colonel, EMSD, I was seconded from the Royal Netherlands Army to the Clingendael Institute of International Relations to perform in the field of security and defence as analyst, researcher, and policy adviser at Clingendael Research, and as trainer/lecturer for Clingendael Academy. Please find the publications I was involved in elsewhere on this LI page.

Clingendael is an internationally renowned Dutch think tank and diplomatic academy that aims to enhance insight in international relations through the adagio of ‘to think, analyse and serve’. 
The institute provides International Organisations [UN, EU, NATO, ...], the Dutch government & parliament, public organisations and the media,  with in-depth analysis of global developments in the fields of economy, diplomacy, international security and conflict management.
 
Clingendael is an independent institute and as such not affiliated with any political, social, or religious movement.
profile_positions.title: Research & Training Fellow [Subject Matter Expert Security & Defence]

profile_positions.description:
Commander ISAF's Advisory & Assistance Team [CAAT] is the strategic telescope of the Four Star Commander of this NATO mission. 
CAAT analyses topics of critical importance for the achievement of ISAF's objectives; Either directed by the Commander to look into specific issues, or directing the Commander's attention to such topics.
Proud CAAT member as Chief of all HQ CAAT Subject Matter Experts [Rule of Law, Law Enforcement, Sustainment, Training, Operational Readiness Processes, Info Ops, INTEL, Government Development, Analysis&Production] and as the Sr Subject Matter Expert on: Security Forces Assistance ; Counter-Insurgency ; Civil-Military Coordination/-cooperation/-liaison ; and Government Development.
Nominated for the NATO Meritorious Service Medal.
profile_positions.title: Chief ASI/ANSF Development  & Senior Subject Matter Expert SFA; COIN ; CMI/GovDev

company.name: Land Warfare Centre of the Royal Netherlands Army

profile_positions.company: Land Warfare Centre of the Royal Netherlands Army
profile_positions.description:
The Land Warfare Department of the LWC is the Army-hub for "knowledge connected to Operations in the Land Domain". The Trends & Developments Section aims to 'scan the international horizon for' & 'perform studies on' all developments that could [or should] influence  the way the Armed Forces need to:
- think about [studies, doctrine, etc]
- prepare for [Education and Training]
- execute [Operations]
its mission.
profile_positions.title: Deputy Chief Trends & Developments / Land Warfare Department

company.name: Operational Education & Training Centre - Doctrine Department

profile_positions.company: Operational Education & Training Centre - Doctrine Department
profile_positions.description: The Doctrine Department of the Operational Education & Trainingcentre of the RNLA is a team of highly motivated specialists and some generalists. We  aim to constantly think about all the ins and outs of Doctrine and to ensure that the Doctrine that makes it to paper is not only up to date, usefull and truthfull but also easy accesible & legible. Doctrine is not only there for senior officers, on the contrary, our junior leaders ought to be triggered to read it!
profile_positions.title: Chief of the 'Functionalities in Land Operations' Doctrine Section

company.name: Education & Training Command of the Army - Reorganisation Working Group

profile_positions.company: Education & Training Command of the Army - Reorganisation Working Group
profile_positions.description:
Designing the new Land Warfare Centre and co-designing the new Land Training Centre.
Co-designing the new Knowledge structure for the Army, supporting the design of the overall new Training and  Education structures for the Army.
profile_positions.title: Reorganisation thinker/writer  'Knowledge-Education-Training'

profile_positions.description: Auditing processes and performances in the fields of Personnel-management, Materiel-management, Financial-management and especially: other 'non-financial management information' / Operational Readiness.
